sum_bart: The Manager of V-Guard Industries, India, will make the initial disclosure to be made by large Corporate as on March 31, 2025. The initial disclosure will be in the prescribed format with reference to the large corporate circulars issued by SEBI.
sum_peg: This is to inform you that V-Guard Industries Ltd has filed an initial disclosure with the stock exchange under the provisions of the Companies Act, 2013.
